metadata.dc:title: Analysis of Correlation Between Working Time Duration and Productivity Index in EU and OECD Countries
metadata.dc:creator: Marianna Krzeminska (https://orcid.org/[0009-0002-9123-9377])
metadata.dc:subject: Working Hours and Productivity Correlation
metadata.dc:description: Automated tool and dataset that investigates the statistical correlation between the average annual hours worked per employee and labour productivity (GDP per hour in PPP) in selected EU and OECD countries (2015-2024).
